text: New Zealand Football (NZF) is the governing body of football in New Zealand. It is in charge of the men's and the women's national teams. The association was founded in 1891. It became a member of FIFA in 1948 and OFC in 1966. Category:1891 establishments Category:19th-century establishments in New Zealand Category:Football governing bodies Category:Football in New Zealand Category:Sports organizations of New Zealand
title: New Zealand Football
